## Changes

{CHANGELOG}

## Features

- ‚úÖ Interactive command system
- ‚úÖ VRChat authentication with 2FA support
- ‚úÖ Real-time log monitoring
- ‚úÖ SQLite blocklist (86+ groups pre-loaded)
- ‚úÖ Desktop notifications (Windows toast)
- ‚úÖ Audio alerts
- ‚úÖ Discord webhook integration
- ‚úÖ VR overlay notifications (VRCX & XSOverlay)
- ‚úÖ Keyword pattern matching
- ‚úÖ Session persistence (auto-login)

## Requirements

- Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
- VRChat installed

## Installation

1. **Download** `VRChatMonitor-{VERSION}-RELEASE-Windows-x64.zip` from the Assets section below
2. **Extract** to a folder of your choice
3. **Run** `vrc-monitor.exe`
4. **Enter** your VRChat credentials when prompted

## Interactive Commands

Once started, type commands at the prompt:
- `help` - Show all available commands
- `test-alert` - Test all notification channels
- `status` - Show monitor status
- `quit` - Exit application

See COMMANDS.md for full reference.
